document_data.caption: A map showing a portion of Cloaksweep Alley and surroundings in the Sea Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Cloaksweep Alley
document_data.mainbody: '''Cloaksweep Alley''' was a small back alley that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: Cloaksweep Alley was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Sea Ward|Sea Ward]]. It passed through a small neighborhood bordered by [[Zarimtar Street]] to the south, [[Mendever Street]] to the west, [[Sul Street]] to the east, and the [[Rough Road]] to the north. Cloaksweep Alley connected to all four larger roads.
